long_description: Plush finishing details, amazing fit and featherlight weight make the Giro Sheer snow helmet a great choice for women who want superior performance and style while they ride. Rigorously lab- and field-tested Super Fit(TM) engineering incorporates careful anatomic measurements and rider input to offer high-performance fit and comfort. In Form(TM) fit system with glove-friendly adjustment dial and vertical fine-tuning accommodates different goggles and head shapes for a custom fit. Stack Vent(TM) design offers seamless integration of goggles and helmet ventilation; it aligns a helmet vent with your goggles' center vent, helping keep goggles clear. In-mold construction fuses a tough, ventilated polycarbonate shell with an impact-absorbing foam liner, resulting in a helmet that is lighter and cooler than many others. Super Cool(TM) vents invite cool, fresh air into the helmet while pushing hot, stale air out; optimized vent shapes help regulate temperature to keep you feeling fresh. Thermostat(TM) ventilation control lets you adjust airflow instantly with a simple, low-profile control button on the outside of the helmet. Compatible with after-market Giro audio systems (sold separately). The Giro Sheer snow helmet complies with ASTM F 2040 and/or CE EN 1077 alpine ski and snowboard helmet standards.
